name: krayon
title: Krayon
description: Allow to overwrite/draw on a webpage and to take a screenshot on it.
author: Simon Ertel

preferences.name: stockageLocal
preferences.title: Local hosting
preferences.description: By defaut will be stocked in a folder call 'Crayon' on your desktop

preferences.name: localDirectory
preferences.title: Select your local directory for storing pic

preferences.name: stockageremote
preferences.title: Remote hosting
preferences.description: Allow you to send generated pics on a server. You must have abilities to manage a file request base64 encoded for receiving it and managing it.

preferences.name: remoteDirectory
preferences.title: Enter an url where your script will be abble to receive post request.

preferences.name: paramName
preferences.title: This string will be the parameter name containing the pic name
preferences.description: For example, if you use the value 'example', your server-side script will have to receive the value has $_POST['example'];

preferences.name: paramPic
preferences.title: This other string will be the parameter name containing the encoded pic in base64.
preferences.description: For example, if you use the value 'example-pic', your server-side script will have to decrypt the value has base64_decode($_POST['example-pic'])
